{{Wired embedded system |brand=DrayTek |model=Vigor 2710 |revision=v3A |is_manuf=Yes |fcc_date=03/06/2010 |fcc_id=VGYV2710NE |type=router, dsl modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50610;AMAZON-S (PSB 50610 E V1.4); |cpu1_cspeed=333 |fla1=8 MiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |ram1=32 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS16M16DS-5T |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Lantiq |sw_model=ADM6996M |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 }} "R1AB-V3A", "120502", and "406-2710000-3A" is silkscreened on the board in the images below.
*[http://whirlpool.net.au/wiki/telnet_guide_01 Telnet on '''whirlpool'''] :These treat Vigor 2700, 2800, 2910 and 2950 Series. :* Devices: [[DrayTek Vigor 2710]], [[DrayTek Vigor 2820]], :[[DrayTek Vigor 2830]], [[DrayTek Vigor 2920]]
==Images== <gallery caption="Odb's images"> File:draytek_vigor2710_board_top.jpg|board top File:draytek_vigor2710_board_bottom.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
